name: Canada
title: Study in Canada

whyStudyInCanada.title: Globally Recognized Education
whyStudyInCanada.description: Canada offers internationally recognized degrees with high academic standards, research opportunities, and strong industry connections.

whyStudyInCanada.title: Work While Studying
whyStudyInCanada.description: International students can work up to 24 hours per week during their studies, allowing them to gain practical experience and support their living expenses.

whyStudyInCanada.title: GIC Financial Requirement
whyStudyInCanada.description: Students must deposit around 22,895 CAD as a Guaranteed Investment Certificate (GIC), ensuring sufficient funds for living expenses in Canada.

whyStudyInCanada.title: Safe & Multicultural Country
whyStudyInCanada.description: Canada is known for its safe environment, welcoming communities, and diverse multicultural society, making it a preferred destination for international students.
